ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Cloud}
“Sorry. Did I wake you?
It's almost dawn, {Tifa}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Cloud}
“It'll be all right, {Tifa}.
You said so yourself yesterday.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Cloud}
“At least we don't have to
go on alone.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Tifa}
“Just a little longer…
A little bit longer…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Tifa}
“This day will never come again…
So let me have this moment…”

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“Sorry. Did I wake you?
It's almost dawn, {Tifa}.”

{Tifa}
“Just a little longer…
A little bit longer…”

{Tifa}
“This day will never come again…
So let me have this moment…”

{Cloud}
“It'll be all right, {Tifa}.
You said so yourself yesterday.”

{Cloud}
“At least we don't have to
go on alone.”

“This might be the last time
we'll ever be together…”
